chunks.chunk_text: The New York State Assembly has passed a bill that would allow people who do not identify as either male or female to use X as a marker to designate their sex on driver's licensesThe new marker would help transgender, non-binary and intersex individuals'identity be recognized in government documentsaccording to a statement from assembly speaker
